privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: BocaBoca ("we", "our", or "Company") values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our application and services.
privacy.lgpdCompliance: This policy complies with Brazil's General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13.709/2018).

providedByYou.title: 1.1 Data provided by you:
providedByYou.connections: Social connections (who you follow and who follows you)

thirdParty.title: 1.3 Third-party data:
thirdParty.description: If you choose to sign in with Apple or Google, we will receive basic profile information as authorized by you.

purposes.recommendations: Show relevant restaurants and recommendations near you
purposes.connect: Connect you with friends and other users
purposes.tokens: Process and distribute BOCA tokens as rewards
purposes.improve: Improve our services and user experience

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: Under the LGPD, we process your data based on the following legal bases:

bases.contract: Contract execution: to provide our services
bases.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest: to improve our services
bases.legal: Legal obligation: when required by law

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We may share your data with:

parties.users: Other users: your public profile, recommendations, and connections
parties.providers: Service providers: companies that help us operate (hosting, SMS delivery)
parties.authorities: Authorities: when required by law or court order

dataSharing.noSale: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

thirdPartyServices.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.intro: We use the following third-party services:

rights.title: 6. Your Rights (LGPD)
rights.intro: Under the LGPD, you have the right to:

list.confirmation: Confirmation of the existence of data processing
list.correction: Correction of incomplete, inaccurate, or outdated data
list.anonymization: Anonymization, blocking, or deletion of data

rights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at: privacidade@bocaboca.xyz

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, and security monitoring. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your data while your account is active or as necessary to provide our services. After account deletion, your data will be removed within 30 days, except when retention is required by law.

tokens.title: 9. BOCA Tokens
tokens.description: BOCA tokens are digital rewards within the BocaBoca ecosystem. They do not constitute currency, securities, or any form of investment. Token use is subject to the Terms of Service.

minors.title: 10. Minors
minors.description: Our services are intended for users 13 years and older. Users between 13 and 18 years old must have consent from a legal guardian to use BocaBoca. We do not intentionally collect data from children under 13. If you believe a child under 13 has provided personal data, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes through the app or by email. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to BocaBoca! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the BocaBoca application and related services ("Service"). By using our Service, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.

about.title: 1. About BocaBoca
about.description: BocaBoca is a social restaurant recommendation platform that connects people through trusted recommendations from friends and acquaintances. Our mission is to transform authentic word-of-mouth recommendations into verified culinary discoveries.

requirements.minor: If you are between 13 and 18 years old, have consent from a legal guardian
requirements.phone: Have a valid mobile phone number
requirements.legal: Have legal capacity to enter into contracts (or guardian consent)
requirements.notBanned: Not have been previously banned from the platform

creation.title: 3.1 Account Creation
creation.description: You can create an account using your phone number, Apple ID, or Google account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities conducted through it.

truthful.title: 3.2 Truthful Information
truthful.description: You agree to provide true and accurate information. Creating fake accounts, using third-party identities, or creating multiple accounts is not permitted.

recommendations.title: 4.1 Your Recommendations
recommendations.description: By posting recommendations, reviews, photos, or other content, you grant BocaBoca a worldwide, non-exclusive, transferable, and sublicensable license to use, reproduce, modify, and display this content in connection with our Service.

guidelines.title: 4.2 Content Guidelines
guidelines.intro: You agree NOT to post content that:

prohibited.offensive: Is offensive, discriminatory, or promotes hatred
prohibited.spam: Contains spam, unauthorized advertising, or malware

trustScore.title: 5. Trust Score
trustScore.description: Trust Score is a metric that reflects the reliability of recommendations based on various factors, including social connections, recommendation history, and community validations. The algorithm is proprietary and may be adjusted at any time.

nature.title: 6.1 Nature of Tokens
nature.description: BOCA tokens are digital reward points within the BocaBoca ecosystem. They can be earned through platform contributions (recommendations, validations, engagement) and used for benefits within the app.

points.notCurrency: Are NOT currency, cryptocurrency, or securities
points.mayChange: May be modified or discontinued at our discretion

actions.manipulate: Manipulate the Trust Score or token system
actions.bots: Use bots, scrapers, or unauthorized automation
actions.harass: Harass, intimidate, or threaten other users
actions.violateTerms: Violate these Terms or related policies

ip.title: 8. Intellectual Property
ip.description: BocaBoca, including its brand, logo, design, code, and features, is the property of the Company and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without authorization.

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.description: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. Recommendations are user opinions and do not represent endorsement by BocaBoca.

liability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, BocaBoca shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from use of the Service, including negative experiences at recommended restaurants.

termination.title: 11. Suspension and Termination
termination.description: We may suspend or terminate your account at any time, with or without notice, for violation of these Terms or for any other reason. You may delete your account at any time through the app settings.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may modify these Terms periodically. Significant changes will be notified through the app. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

law.title: 13. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
law.description: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. Any dispute shall be submitted to the courts of São Paulo, SP, to the exclusion of any other.

provisions.severability: If any provision is deemed invalid, the remaining provisions shall remain in effect
provisions.waiver: Failure to exercise any right does not constitute a waiver
provisions.entireAgreement: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and BocaBoca

terms.agreement: By creating an account or using BocaBoca, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
